content: 8 increase es to weave in later all t e rest of t e sock is worked in mc only mc knit 15 18 25 rounds in stockinette t en remove your marker setup for heel rig t sock only k12 14 16 slip next 24 28 32 sts onto a st older to work for instep later left sock only k36 42 48 slip next 24 28 32 sts onto a st older to work for instep later continuf for both socks t e 24 28 32 sts you ave still on your needle s will be worked back and fort for eel fap count t ose stitc es now and c eck t at t e cat is going to sit above your ankle bone at t e side of t e sock / at t e edge of t e eel fap turn your work so ws is facing you ©caoua cofff 2018 pattfrn is for non-commfrcial pfrsonal usf only all rights rfsfrvfd papagfno v 1 0 pagf 3/5 papageno socks - by caoua cofee heel flap ws slyf p23 27 31 turn rs * slyb k1 repeat from * to end of row turn work t ese 2 row 14 16 18 times altoget er i e 28 32 36 eel fap row total turn heel ws slyf purl 14 16 18 p2tog p1 turn rs slyb knit 7 7 7 ssk k1 turn ws slyf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs slyb knit to 1 st before gap k2tog k1 turn repeat t e last 2 row until all sts ave been worked don t turn after t e last rs row now 16 18 20 eel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along side of eel fap pick up and knit one st between fap and instep put t e 24 28 32 eld instep sts back onto t e needles and knit t em t en pick up and knit 1 st between instep and eel fap pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along second side of eel fap and knit across t e 31 35 3 ot er sole sts t is is t e new beginning of t e round so replace your marker now you ave 24 28 32 sts for t e instep and 46 52 58 sts for t e sole gusset decreases round 1 k all sts round 2 k all 24 28 32 instep sts t en k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 repeat t ese 2 rounds i e decreasing by 2 sts on t e sole every ot er row until 24 28 32 sole sts remain foot work in stockinette until foot measures 1 25 1 5 1 75 increase es less t en desired lengt toe round 1 k all sts round 2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog
